home.title: Data Analysis & Visualization
home.subtitle: Analyze data and check the results through our survey.
home.hero_subtitle:
Visualize emotions as media art
through surveys and AI facial analysis.
home.section_about_subtitle: presents a new way to understand and express emotions
home.feature_survey_desc: Identify your current emotional state through simple questions
home.feature_analysis_desc: Accurately analyze emotions by recognizing facial expressions
home.feature_art_desc: Create unique media art based on analyzed emotions
home.section_flow_subtitle: Complete your own emotion art in 4 steps
home.benefit1_desc: Develop the ability to objectively identify and understand your emotions
home.benefit2_desc: Discover new ways of self-expression by artistically expressing emotions
home.benefit3_desc: Gain psychological stability by visualizing and sharing emotions
home.benefit4_desc: Own a one-of-a-kind media art piece containing your emotions
home.card_analyze_desc: Go to the Analysis page and start emotion Analysis.
